data.name: DisabledGeneric
data.value: The virtual advisor is currently offline. Please try again later.

data.name: NoUnderstanding
data.value: I'm sorry, I didn't understand your question. Could you please repeat it?

data.name: RecommendationsFound
data.value: I've selected a few courses that could suit you.

data.name: NoMatch
data.value: I couldn't find an exact match right now. Could you clarify your question?

data.name: NoMatchFollowUp
data.value: Please add the area you're interested in or type a course keyword.

data.name: DisabledEscalation
data.value: The virtual advisor is currently offline. Please reach us through another channel.

data.name: EscalationSuccess
data.value: Thank you, we've forwarded your request to our colleagues. They'll get back to you as soon as possible at the provided email.

data.name: TranscriptDefault
data.value: The customer requested to be contacted through the chatbot.
